solution: WHEN I WALK ALONG WITH TWO OTHERS, THEY MAY SERVE ME AS MY TEACHERS. I WILL SELECT THEIR GOOD QUALITIES AND FOLLOW THEM, THEIR BAD QUALITIES AND AVOID THEM.
